TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class SqlTransaction : System.Data.Common.DbTransaction, IDisposable
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlTransaction extends System.Data.Common.DbTransaction implements class System.Data.IDbTransaction, class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class SqlTransaction Inherits DbTransaction Implements IDisposable
public ref class SqlTransaction sealed : System::Data::Common::DbTransaction, IDisposable
type SqlTransaction = class inherit DbTransaction interface IDbTransaction interface IDisposable

summary.span: 表示将在 SQL Server 数据库中进行的 Transact-SQL 事务。

span.span: Represents a Transact-SQL transaction to be made in a SQL Server database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序通过在 对象上调用 来创建 对象。The application creates a object by calling on the object. 与事务关联的所有后续操作（例如，提交或中止事务）都在 对象上执行。All subsequent operations associated with the transaction (for example, committing or aborting the transaction), are performed on the object. > [!NOTE] > `Try`/`Catch` 应始终在提交或回滚 时使用异常处理。`Try`/`Catch` exception handling should always be used when committing or rolling back a . 如果连接终止，或者事务已在服务器上回滚，则 和 都会生成 。Both and generate an if the connection is terminated or if the transaction has already been rolled back on the server. 有关 SQL Server 事务的详细信息，请参阅[显式事务](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms175127\(SQL.105\).aspx)和[编码高效事务](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms187484\(SQL.105\).aspx)。For more information on SQL Server transactions, see [Explicit Transactions](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms175127\(SQL.105\).aspx) and [Coding Efficient Transactions](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms187484\(SQL.105\).aspx). ## Examples 下面的示例创建 和 。The following example creates a and a . 它还演示了如何使用 、和 方法。It also demonstrates how to use the , , and methods. 事务会回滚到任何错误，或者，如果在未事先提交的情况下将其释放，则为。The transaction is rolled back on any error, or if it is disposed without first being committed. `Try`/`Catch` 错误处理用于在尝试提交或回滚事务时处理任何错误。`Try`/`Catch` error handling is used to handle any errors when attempting to commit or roll back the transaction. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Commit() cil managed
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Commit() cil managed
abstract member Commit : unit -> unit override this.Commit : unit -> unit

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法等效于 Transact-sql COMMIT TRANSACTION 语句。The method is equivalent to the Transact-SQL COMMIT TRANSACTION statement. 在事务提交后，不能回滚事务，因为所有修改都已成为数据库的永久部分。You cannot roll back a transaction once it has been committed, because all modifications have become a permanent part of the database. 有关详细信息，请参阅[COMMIT TRANSACTION （transact-sql） ](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/commit-transaction-transact-sql)。For more information, see [COMMIT TRANSACTION (Transact-SQL) ](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/commit-transaction-transact-sql). > [!NOTE] > `Try`/`Catch` 应始终在提交或回滚 时使用异常处理。`Try`/`Catch` exception handling should always be used when committing or rolling back a . 如果连接终止，或者事务已在服务器上回滚，则 `Commit` 和 都会生成 。Both `Commit` and generates an if the connection is terminated or if the transaction has already been rolled back on the server. 有关 SQL Server 事务的详细信息，请参阅[事务（transact-sql）](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transactions-transact-sql)。For more information on SQL Server transactions, see [Transactions (Transact-SQL)](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transactions-transact-sql). ## Examples 下面的示例创建 和 。The following example creates a and a . 它还演示了如何使用 、和 方法。It also demonstrates how to use the , , and methods. 任何错误都将回滚事务。The transaction is rolled back on any error. `Try`/`Catch` 错误处理用于在尝试提交或回滚事务时处理任何错误。`Try`/`Catch` error handling is used to handle any errors when attempting to commit or roll back the transaction. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 在尝试提交事务时出错。

span.span: An error occurred while trying to commit the transaction.
The transaction has already been committed or rolled back.

summary.span: 获取与该事务关联的 对象，或者如果该事务不再有效，则为 。

span.span: Gets the object associated with the transaction, or if the transaction is no longer valid.

value.span: 与事务关联的 对象。

span.span: The object associated with the transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单个应用程序可以有多个数据库连接，每个连接都有零个或多个事务。A single application may have multiple database connections, each with zero or more transactions. 此属性可让你确定与 创建的特定事务关联的连接对象。This property lets you determine the connection object associated with a particular transaction created by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不支持并行事务。Parallel transactions are not supported. 因此， 适用于整个事务。Therefore, the applies to the whole transaction. 有关 SQL Server 隔离级别的详细信息，请参阅[事务隔离级别](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transaction-isolation-levels)。For more information on SQL Server isolation levels, see [Transaction Isolation Levels](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transaction-isolation-levels).

span.span: Rolls back a transaction from a pending state.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Rollback() cil managed
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Rollback() cil managed
abstract member Rollback : unit -> unit override this.Rollback : unit -> unit

span.span: Rolls back a transaction from a pending state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法等效于 Transact-sql ROLLBACK TRANSACTION 语句。The method is equivalent to the Transact-SQL ROLLBACK TRANSACTION statement. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ROLLBACK TRANSACTION （transact-sql） ](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/rollback-transaction-transact-sql)。For more information, see [ROLLBACK TRANSACTION (Transact-SQL) ](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/rollback-transaction-transact-sql). 仅可从挂起状态回滚事务（在调用 之后、调用 之前）。The transaction can only be rolled back from a pending state (after has been called, but before is called). 在调用 `Commit` 或 `Rollback` 之前，事务会回滚。The transaction is rolled back in the event it is disposed before `Commit` or `Rollback` is called. > [!NOTE] > 在回滚事务时，应始终使用 `Try`/`Catch` 异常处理。`Try`/`Catch` exception handling should always be used when rolling back a transaction. 如果连接终止或事务已在服务器上回滚，则 `Rollback` 生成 。A `Rollback` generates an if the connection is terminated or if the transaction has already been rolled back on the server. 有关 SQL Server 事务的详细信息，请参阅[事务（transact-sql）](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transactions-transact-sql)。For more information on SQL Server transactions, see [Transactions (Transact-SQL)](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transactions-transact-sql). ## Examples 下面的示例创建 和 。The following example creates a and a . 它还演示了如何使用 、和 方法。It also demonstrates how to use the , , and methods. 任何错误都将回滚事务。The transaction is rolled back on any error. `Try`/`Catch` 错误处理用于在尝试提交或回滚事务时处理任何错误。`Try`/`Catch` error handling is used to handle any errors when attempting to commit or roll back the transaction. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 在尝试提交事务时出错。

span.span: An error occurred while trying to commit the transaction.
The transaction has already been committed or rolled back.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Rollback(string transactionName) cil managed

param.name: transactionName
param.span: 要回滚的事务的名称，或要回滚到的保存点的名称。

span.span: The name of the transaction to roll back, or the savepoint to which to roll back.

summary.span: 从挂起状态回滚事务，并指定事务或保存点名称。

span.span: Rolls back a transaction from a pending state, and specifies the transaction or savepoint name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法等效于 Transact-sql ROLLBACK TRANSACTION 语句。The method is equivalent to the Transact-SQL ROLLBACK TRANSACTION statement. 有关详细信息，请参阅[事务（transact-sql）](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transactions-transact-sql)。For more information, see [Transactions (Transact-SQL)](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transactions-transact-sql). 仅可从挂起状态回滚事务（在调用 之后、调用 之前）。The transaction can only be rolled back from a pending state (after has been called, but before is called). 如果在调用 `Commit` 或 `Rollback` 之前释放事务，则回滚该事务。The transaction is rolled back if it is disposed before `Commit` or `Rollback` is called. > [!NOTE] > 在回滚事务时，应始终使用 `Try`/`Catch` 异常处理。`Try`/`Catch` exception handling should always be used when rolling back a transaction. 如果连接终止或事务已在服务器上回滚，则 `Rollback` 生成 。A `Rollback` generates an if the connection is terminated or if the transaction has already been rolled back on the server. 有关 SQL Server 事务的详细信息，请参阅[事务（transact-sql）](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transactions-transact-sql)。For more information on SQL Server transactions, see [Transactions (Transact-SQL)](/sql/t-sql/language-elements/transactions-transact-sql). ## Examples 下面的示例创建 和 。The following example creates a and a . 它还演示了如何使用 、和 方法。It also demonstrates how to use the , , and methods. 任何错误都将回滚事务。The transaction is rolled back on any error. `Try`/`Catch` 错误处理用于在尝试提交或回滚事务时处理任何错误。`Try`/`Catch` error handling is used to handle any errors when attempting to commit or roll back the transaction. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction2 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlConnection.BeginTransaction2 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The transaction has already been committed or rolled back.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save(string savePointName) cil managed

summary.span: 在事务中创建保存点（它可用于回滚事务的一部分），并指定保存点名称。

span.span: Creates a savepoint in the transaction that can be used to roll back a part of the transaction, and specifies the savepoint name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法等效于 Transact-sql SAVE TRANSACTION 语句。 method is equivalent to the Transact-SQL SAVE TRANSACTION statement. `savePoint` 参数中使用的值可以与 方法的某些实现的 `transactionName` 参数中使用的值相同。The value used in the `savePoint` parameter can be the same value used in the `transactionName` parameter of some implementations of the method. 保存点提供了回滚部分事务的机制。Savepoints offer a mechanism to roll back parts of transactions. 使用 方法创建保存点，然后调用 方法以回滚到保存点，而不是回滚到事务的开始。You create a savepoint using the method, and then later call the method to roll back to the savepoint instead of rolling back to the start of the transaction.

exception.span: 在尝试提交事务时出错。

span.span: An error occurred while trying to commit the transaction.
The transaction has already been committed or rolled back.
